detail_desc: Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved body in soft, stretch viscose jersey with a slightly wider neckline and press-studs at the crotch.

Seamless sports bra in fast-drying fabric with removable inserts, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide, ribbed trim at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Block-coloured jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an appliqué on the front. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and diagonal front pockets. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck top in a cotton-blend jersey with short sleeves and sewn-in turn-ups.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and decorative drawstring with a sewn-on bow at the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a gently rounded hem.
Multi-strand necklace covered in asymmetric plastic beads. Adjustable length approx. 40-48 cm.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Key pocket in the waistband.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy cotton weave with a print and appliqués. Stand-up collar, detachable hood and zip at the front with a wind flap and press-studs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, ribbed inner cuffs and a single back vent. Quilted lining.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.

Balconette bra in lace with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that lift and shape. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes and satin ribbon ties.
Purl-knit jumper in a cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back with sections in ventilating mesh and a wide elastic hem. Medium support.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at each end. One outer compartment with an imitation suede flap and magnetic fastener. Lined. Size 18x23 cm.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Chino shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist and a detachable braided belt in imitation suede. Zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets, and short slits in the sides.
Oversized top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Two-button jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket with a lining that can be used as a decorative handkerchief, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Wide polo-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved sports jacket in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front and front pockets. Print motif on the back and sleeves.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and slim legs.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch and an opening with press-studs at one side.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric in a narrow cut at the top with short, thin shoulder straps and deep armholes. Loose-fitting.
Ankle-length trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist and fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Fake welt pockets at the front, a fake back pocket and tapered legs with creases.
Trousers in slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Underwired lace bra with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and no fastenings.
Dress in a cotton weave with short butterfly sleeves and a yoke with decorative gathers. Buttons at the back. Unlined.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Single-button jacket in a textured, stretch weave with peak lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front and seam at the waist with a metal button at one side. Long, wide-cuffed sleeves with a metal button. Lined.
Half-shaft wellingtons with a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and button placket. Gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Underwired lace bra with unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey with a double-layered hood with a wrapover front.
Cargo shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with faceted glass beads. Adjustable length, 60-68 cm.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight-cut hems.
Metal watch with a narrow adjustable strap with a metal buckle. Width of strap 1.5 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.5 cm.
Jacquard-patterned running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Seamless.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Top in sturdy jersey with a slight sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and flounces at the top.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.

Sandals in imitation leather with covered block heels. Foot strap decorated with a metal chain and a narrow, adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 5 cm.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

One-shoulder blouse in airy, patterned organza with covered elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the shoulder. Long balloon sleeve with elastication and a flounce at the cuff. Partly lined.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Cap in woven fabric with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Calf-length dress in soft, patterned satin. Narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and a straight cut further down that widens at the hem. Lined.

Cargo trousers in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Suit trousers in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Pockets in the side seams, welt back pockets and creases. Slim fit.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with decorative studs. High waist, low crotch, button fly and straight legs.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, gathers at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.

Ankle boots in waterproof functional fabric with glittery sections and imitation leather details. Padded edge, an adjustable hook and loop fastening and elastic laces at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the boots on. Reflective details, mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit wool. Size 15x126 cm.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal detail at one end and a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and zipped front pockets. Pile lining.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Knee-length, straight-cut dress in a softly draping weave with a small stand-up collar and a V-neck with a concealed button at the front. 3/4-length sleeves with a shiny metal button at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless dress in an organic cotton weave with buttons down the front and flared hem. Lined at the top.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a faux fur pompom on top.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with pointelle-knit sections at the front and down the sleeves. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the top, cuffs and hem.
Wide Alice band in satin-covered plastic with pearly beads and a draped detail at the top. Grosgrain at the ends.
Fitted, double-breasted coat in a felted weave with a collar, decorative pocket flaps at the front, and a single back vent. Lined.
Slightly shorter-style jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a boat neck and long dolman sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton flannel. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
